name: BollywoodFacts
0:
”Alexa, Launch bollywood facts”
”Alexa, Open bollywood facts and give me a fact”
”Alexa, ask Bollywood facts to give me a fact.”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: bollywood facts
des: Gives you short fact about a bollywood star. Sample response Here's your fact about Priyanka Chopra. Priyanka Chopra was born 18 July, 1982 in Jamshedpur, India, to the family of Capt. Dr. Ashok Chopra and Dr. Madhu Chopra, both Indian Army physicians. She had a very varied upbringing. She started her education at La Martinière Girls College in Lucknow as a resident student; a short stay at Maria Goretti College in Bareilly prepared her for further studies in the U.S. Having completed tenth grade in Boston, Massachusetts, U.S., she wanted to become a software engineer or a criminal psychologist.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
